Rise young doctor Mitica Herod assigned to a provincial hospital, the doctor makes Mitroi prototype capped professional character, to see jeopardized the director of the hospital. Mitica (enthusiastic, charismatic and convincing in the role of actor Mircea Diaconu) makes no compromises in relation to his superior, which always reminds him of his mission, the function they represent. Ignore the so-called "social conveniences" and not compromising in addressing hospital and patients.
